name: Purpose
text: §303-1  Purpose.  The purpose of this chapter is to provide the means by which employees of the department of education and the University of Hawaii may qualify for the favorable benefits of section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended. [L 1967, c 40, pt of §1; HRS §303-1; am L 1999, c 123, §2(2)]
